text: @BorisJohnson @10DowningStreet @RishiSunak So you can have a meal here as many times as you want, 63 times if everyday from 4/7 to my wedding day, surrounded by 63 lots of 30 strangers each time and I can't have 1 meal after my wedding with 30 loved ones socially distanced on 1 day? Nonsense! #wedding #coronavirus
